 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַב‎</span>] **verb** ==hurt, pain, grieve== (Late Hebrew Nithp. and in derivatives; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצַב‎</span> ***be in pain*** (rare); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be hard, difficult***, [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 50, compare 201</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be angry***, but dubious); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצָבוֺ‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.6|1Kgs 1:6]] his father ***had*** not ***pained him*** ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצָרוֺ‎</span>, but see [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]); insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַב‎</span> (with other words) [[2Sam.13.21|2Sam 13:21]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבִלְתִּי עָצְבִּי‎</span> [[1Chr.4.10|1Chr 4:10]] ***that*** it (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span>) ***may not pain me; Passive participle*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצוּבַת רוּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.54.6|Isa 54:6]] ***hurt in spirit*** (of Zion under figure of deserted wife). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְצַב‎</span> [[1Sam.20.24|1Sam 20:24]] ***be pained*** for (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person; strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעֱצַב‎</span> [[2Sam.19.3|2Sam 19:3]] the king ***is in pain*** (is grieving) for (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָצֵב‎</span> [[1Sam.20.3|1Sam 20:3]] lest ***he be pained***; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּהֶם‎</span> instrumental [[Eccl.10.9|Eccl 10:9]] ***shall be hurt*** by them (i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבָנִים‎</span>; only here of physical pain); 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּעָֽצְבוּ‎</span> [[Gen.45.5|Gen 45:5]] ***be*** not ***grieved*** (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִחַר‎</span>; followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span> ***that*** ye sold me), compare [[Neh.8.10|Neh 8:10]]; [[Neh.8.11|Neh 8:11]] (absolute) ***do not grieve***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִצְּבוּ‎</span> with accusative [[Isa.63.10|Isa 63:10]] ***they vexed*** his holy spirit (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוּ‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבָרַי יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Ps.56.6|Ps 56:6]] ***my affairs they vex*** ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others), but improbable, &lt; [[BDB#Che|Che]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדָבָר יְע‎</span> ***with speech they vex*** (me). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲצִיבוּהוּ‎</span> [[Ps.78.40|Ps 78:40]] ***they used to cause him*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***pain.*** **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְעַצֵּב אֶללִֿבּוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.6.6|Gen 6:6]] ***and he was vexed to his heart*** (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּנָּחֶם‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיִּתְעַצְּבוּ‎</span> [[Gen.34.7|Gen 34:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּחַר‎</span>, followed by clause with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span>). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַב‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==shape, fashion== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***stretch*** child ***into shape***; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup> compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***out, cut off*** [whence idea of ***carving, fashioning***]); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדֶיךָ עִצְּבוּנִי וַעיַּעֲשׂוּנִי‎</span> [[Job.10.8|Job 10:8]] ***thy hands shaped me***, etc. **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitiveconstruct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַעֲצִבָה‎</span> [[Jer.44.19|Jer 44:19]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָהּ‎</span>-, ***to fashion her***, i.e. make images of her (possibly denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצָב‎</span>).
